game.name: Dofamine
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 수수께끼의 미로를 탐험하고 힉스 보손 또는 "신 입자"를 사용한 실험에 이어 연구 시설에서 종말론 적 사건을 조사해야합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You must explore the labyrinth of riddles and investigate the apocalyptic event at the research facility following the experiments with the Higgs boson, or “the God particle”.

reviewHighlights.text: Cool game, really like the vibe and puzzles, feels mysterious wow
Atmospheric, a little creepy, but very addictive. It's interesting to explore the locations, and the story is engaging, making it a breeze to complete...
